App.name: Buy Say Sell
App.pleaseConnect: Please connect your wallet to use.

BriefIntro.begin: Buy Say Sell is an altered social media where you can:
BriefIntro.buyLong: Each story has one unique owner. Buy to own the story. You can also create new stories.
BriefIntro.sayLong: As the owner, you are the only one who can comment to the story. Say something.
BriefIntro.sellLong: List your story to the market. Your words value the story.

what.title: What
what.p1: Buy Say Sell is an altered social media. Here stories can be traded, and only the owner of a story can add content to it.

motivation.title: Motivation
motivation.p1: Human creates too much trash infomation on the Internet. A place for only valueable information is desired. By valueable we mean the words worth money. People pays to say, and says to make people pay.
motivation.p2: The reason to pay for saying can be either cooperative or competitive. One can make an interesting story beginning to attract lovers to continue the story, or make a debative story beginning to attract haters to express a different opinion. In both cases, the buyer needs to thoughtfully arrange their words to keep the story interesting so the sotry can be sold. By this mechanism, those boring garbage information makers are kept away from this social media.

tech.title: Technical Overview
tech.p1: Buy Say Sell is a decenteralized application based on Ethereum. The service is purely on-chain. The frontend webpage is also open-sourced and anyone can deploy it.
tech.p2: The stories are standard ERC-721 NFT's, so they can also be traded outside this platform, like crypto wallets and NFT markets.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.p1: Currently Buy Say Sell is gas-only. Gas are paid to network validators (miners), and the developers are totally volunteering.
pricing.p2: This application is developed mostly for experimental purpose.
